page.title: 14Reen Manor Farm
page.content: I went to Reen Manor Farm.The man who owns it is Mr.Opie.This farm was mentioned in the very first Domesday Book.It was probably there before 700AD.Part of it was an old chapel which had something to do with Chapel Rock on the beach.He gave us a drink and showed us his son's pet turantula. We took some photos and did some sketches of the farm buildings.We used a cassette recorder for our interview. A dog came out and scared us.Mr.Opie said that the farm has changed a great deal this year.Last year it was a real farm but now he has sold most of his animals and turned his buildings into holiday chalets.He still had some horses in one of the fields.We went in Miss Perriman's metro.When we got back to school we told the rest of the class about our trip.I enjoyed it very much.
